Title: Front Display
Description: An information application for multimedia cases with graphical touchscreen display. It displays such information like time, date, weather condition, current music track played (e.g. from Winamp, iTunes) and so on.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
An information application for multimedia cases with graphical touchscreen display. It displays such information like time, date, weather condition, current music track played (e.g. from Winamp, iTunes) and so on.

Requirements
  • .NET Framework 3.5 SP1

Features
  • Displays date and time, weather condition, media information (supports MediaPortal, Music Player Daemon, Winamp, iTunes and any other players via plugins).
  • Animated backgrounds. It's possible to write plugins for background too.
  • Plugins interface. It's easy to create any type of plugin: information plugin, media information plugin, background plugin etc.
  • Editable color themes.
  • Localization for any languages is easy to add via xml files.

Screen shots




  • Tested only with SilverStone Grandia GD-02MT case. This case has 4.3" display, so maybe this application will not look quite good on bigger displays.
